name: Travis
0:
”Alexa, Open Travis Bot”
”Alexa, Ask Travis bot best season to visit Haridwar”
”Alexa, Ask Travis bot temperature of Haridwar”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: travis bot
des:
Travis bot provides all those information, which every traveler needs.

#1. Launch Skill
"Alexa, open Travis Bot"

#2. Information About a Location : This will give a brief introduction about the place you want to go.
 
- After launching Skill: you can say
 --"I want to know about 'Haridwar' " , 
 --"tell me about Haridwar" 


-Direct Method:
"Alexa , ask travis bot to tell me about 'Haridwar' "

#3. Current Temperature: Tells the current temperature of the location.
 --"Alexa , ask travis bot current temperature of 'Haridwar' "

#4. Place to visit: This will search top places which one must see while travelling a particular location.
 --"Alexa , ask travis bot place to visit in 'Haridwar' "

#5. Best Time To Visit: To make travelling more fun, one must travel in peak season.
 --"Alexa , ask travis bot best time to visit 'Haridwar' "
 --"Alexa , ask travis bot best season to visit 'Haridwar' "

#6. How To Reach: This one is necessary, To explore something we need to be present there. This will help you.
 --"Alexa , ask travis bot how to reach 'Auli' "

#7. Nearest Railway Station: This will inform you about the nearest station to your location.
 --"Alexa , ask travis bot nearest railway station to 'Haridwar' "

#8. Nearest Airport: This will inform you about the nearest airport to your location.
 --"Alexa , ask travis bot nearest airport to 'Haridwar' "

#9. Added support for Restaurants Near You ( For All supported Languages ) :
-"ask travis bot top ten restaurants in har ki paudi with rating"
-"ask travis bot restaurants in har ki paudi with rating"
-"ask travis bot top five restaurants in har ki paudi "

Please Feel Free To Give Review and Suggestions about the skill. And Don't Forget to tell about 'Travis Bot' to your Family and Friends.

Cheers!!!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
